titleStmt.title: A paradox usefull for the times.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.

notesStmt.note: A defense of his moderate royalism and his works, "A description of an annuall world," 1641, "Sacred poems," 1641, and "A rare paterne of iustice and mercy," 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
